i18n.control

Class SimpleLocalizationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • i18n.control.SimpleLocalizationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalizationController

    public class SimpleLocalizationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocalizationController
    Implementation of LocalizationController using Java ResourceBundle subsystem.

    TODO: Move from unhandy properties-files to something more sophisticated.

    Author:
    Stefan Werner
